description: A comprehensive AI-powered fitness tracking application that enables AI tools to interact intelligently with user fitness data, providing personalized workout plans, nutrition tracking, and progress analysis through natural language.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for AI-generated fitness plans

DEFAULT_USER_ID.description: Custom user ID for single-user setups

UPSTASH_REDIS_REST_URL.description: Optional Redis URL for enhanced performance

UPSTASH_REDIS_REST_TOKEN.description: Optional Redis token for enhanced performance

name: Fitness Coach MCP
